item.title: Tree stump needs removing, 18th December
item.description:
Outside 21 Selborne Road Sidcup in grass verge. Dead tree was cut down in early October 2025 leaving a stump 1.5 metre high. BC said it would be taken out in November…still there ! Please remove asap thank you. It’s been long enough (ps thanks to BC for the new trees in the road)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Selborne Road, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
